attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: Well I can here to support my favorite Orange man 💀but I open the app it and it keeps showing me “fake news”

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: first of all when i opened the app i saw a picture of a disgusting racist and at the sight of this i poured bleach on my eyes because the sight of such an atrocity made me want to vomit and cry

attributes.title: Remove this trash
attributes.review: This app is terrible kept showing me pictures of a Cheeto dumb dumb hay hair having musty dusty person remove this app

attributes.title: Delete this app!!!!!
attributes.review: I am absolutely disgusted with this service. It leaves a bitter taste in my mouth. This app has no factual information and is spreading bad hateful speech towards minorities. DELETE THIS!!!

attributes.title: Worst. App. Ever.
attributes.review: I can’t BELIEVE they made a whole app about a cheeto. And not even the good type of Cheeto; a fat, off brand cheese puff - whose only personality trait is to copycat Hitler and surpass him. Delete this app.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Glitches, also like the app came to life and threw my baby to a tree. Honestly worst app ever🤢. Chileee...anyways y’all want something from McDonald’s?

attributes.title: It’s not working out...
attributes.review: This app is very troublesome. It’s not working out. Gave me a virus. Now I need to buy a new phone. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: TRES NO BUENO
attributes.review: See my problem is that i got this app and right when it downloaded my caterpillar ran away off its leash. Then my elephant STEPPED on it he didn’t even make it to be a butterfly👁💧👄💧👁..... NOW MY GIRAFFE IS STEPPING ON MY CAR!!!!! THIS APP CAUSED MAHEM AND DEATH

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I am completely disgusted with this app just like I am with our piggy that sits in office 🤧. I opened the app to see a pig mocking me. I just can’t believe the disrespect.

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: The app is awful with a ugly person in it. 10/10 would def not get again.
